title: Yummy Gummy Jelly Drop
summary: Yummy Gummy sweetest candy match 3 game.

descriptionHTML:
Welcome in the Yummy Gummy Jelly Drop the world of jelly drop sugary magic match connecting fruit game. Yummy Gummy Jelly Drop is a very addictive Jelly splash connect lines puzzle game. Play with fresh and colorful gummy candy, so its yummy gummy and super delicious jelly splash . This is a very addictive jelly splash connect lines puzzle game that you simply cannot miss! every kind of gummy jelly is here for you.
Immerse your fingers into sweetest Candy Gummy . Collect gummy candies to march through this amazingly sweet story.
How to play :
Connect yummy gummy fruits to solve compelling levels in this magic match puzzle adventure.
Features :
Connect 3 yummy juicy fruits to collect them.
Solve over 100 magical match levels with jelly dripping sugary fruits
Colorful and vivid gummy candy bubble .
Sweet connect make jellies combos.
You’re ready for this gummy candy magical match game now. Connect them in this jelly splash mania adventure, so its yummy gummy and juicy !
If you like this game, please rate it and leave a comment. As a developer your support is greatly appreciated. Thank you for your help! If you don't like something in the game, please email me at info@vimapmobi.com and tell me why. I want to hear your feedback and comments so I can continue to make this game better.
You can find me on Twitter at @alanpstern.
comments: Candy match 3 frenzy is better than candy crush game....... I like it ...... Good working in this game by developer...... Superb game
Yummy gummy candy match 3 frenzy game. Cool 3 match game.
This game isn't too bad but it can go on
recentChanges: Yummy Gummy is now available in arabic,french,german,spanish languages.
